title: Which Zodiac Signs Make the Best Friends? Everything You Need to Know

steps.title: Aries’ best friends are Gemini, Sagittarius, and Leo.
steps.content: Aries’ best friends are Gemini, Sagittarius, and Leo. Aries is a fire sign ruled by Mars, the planet of action and energy—which means they always have tons of it! [1] X Research source This sign is fearless, dynamic, and forthright. They’re not used to being idle when they can search for their next big adventure and need friends who can keep up with their fierce passion for life. That’s why Gemini, Sagittarius, and Leo make ideal BFFs. Gemini is a mutable air sign (meaning they’re flexible and accepting of change). Like Aries, Gemini is curious and playful; since Gemini forms a sextile to Aries, this pair will never stop having fun! Sagittarius is as free-spirited and energetic as Aries. These signs form a trine together, so they'll get along easily—adventure is always around the corner for them! Leo and Aries are the life of the party! They love socializing and entertaining crowds of people (though they may need to learn to share the spotlight). As fire signs, they also form a harmonious trine.

steps.title: Taurus’ best friends are Cancer, Virgo, and Pisces.
steps.content: Taurus’ best friends are Cancer, Virgo, and Pisces. Taurus is a gentle, loyal earth sign ruled by Venus, the planet of love and beauty. They’re also practical and down-to-earth, and because they’re a fixed sign (meaning they’re one of the “stabilizer” zodiac signs), Taurus can also be quite stubborn! It can be hard for reserved Taurus to make new friends, but it’s easiest for them to connect with Cancer, Virgo, and Pisces. [2] X Research source Cancer is sextile to Taurus, so this pair can forge a sweet, lighthearted friendship. Cancer Both signs are homebodies; they’ll love staying in, eating comfort food, and watching their favorite movies together. Virgo is trine to Taurus, so this pair will be fast friends with a deep understanding of one another. Both signs are goal-oriented and thoughtful, preferring routines to spontaneity. Pisces brings emotional depth to their friendship with Taurus. These signs are sextile and balance one another out; Taurus grounds Pisces, while Pisces encourages Taurus to explore their creative side.

steps.title: Gemini’s best friends are Aries, Leo, and Libra.
steps.content: Gemini’s best friends are Aries, Leo, and Libra. Ruled by Mercury, the planet of communication, Gemini is a clever and extremely charismatic air sign. Making friends is easy for them; Gemini is a social butterfly and a mutable sign, meaning they can adapt seamlessly to any situation! Gemini is all about having fun and trying new things, and they look for equally spirited friends who prioritize the same things. Aries and Gemini are determined to do (and experience) as much as possible. They’ll likely get into some mischief together—but they’ll have tons of fun getting out of it, too. Leo and Gemini are sextile to one another. Both view the world with the same sense of childlike wonder, and they’re highly social, so they’ll have an instant, easygoing connection. Libra and Gemini are trine air signs, which means they’ll share a deep bond. Both are witty and talkative; these BFFs could chat all day and never get bored!

steps.title: Cancer’s best friends are Taurus, Pisces, and Scorpio.
steps.content: Cancer’s best friends are Taurus, Pisces, and Scorpio. Cancer is a sensitive and intuitive water sign ruled by the Moon, which oversees emotions and the subconscious. This makes Cancer a soft, nurturing friend with an unexpectedly silly sense of humor! Cancer is self-protective and cautious, so it takes them time to open up to new friends—but once they do, this sign will be a loving, compassionate friend for life. [3] X Research source Taurus is dependable, trustworthy, and generally very stable; all qualities that Cancer adores in a friend. It’s easy for these signs to feel safe and comfortable with each other. Pisces is trine to Cancer, making this a pleasant friendship defined by warmth and sensitivity. Cancer shares Pisces’ empathy, so they’ll love having deep, emotional conversations together! Scorpio and Cancer also form a trine, and they’re often drawn to one another as fellow water signs. Both may be a little reserved at first, but won’t hesitate to share everything with one another once they build trust.

steps.title: Leo’s best friends are Gemini, Libra, and Aquarius.
steps.content: Leo’s best friends are Gemini, Libra, and Aquarius. As a fire sign ruled by the Sun (which governs self-image and core identity), Leo is confident and passionate! [4] X Research source Leo is a fixed sign, so they tend to be loyal and fiercely protective of friends—though they can also be a little dramatic. Leo enjoys being the center of attention and needs friends like Gemini, Libra, and Aquarius to give them the adoration they crave. Gemini is the funny, smooth-talking friend that can make Leo feel great about themselves, while Leo can always brighten Gemini’s day with their bright, cheerful disposition. Libra and Leo are sextile and have a lot in common; both are social, style-conscious and love luxurious things, so it’s easy for them to spend time together. Parties and shopping trips are always fun for these BFFs! Aquarius and Leo are opposites on the zodiac wheel; they have very different energies but still get along. Leo often feels inspired by Aquarius’ creative, unorthodox ideas, and Aquarius admires Leo’s inner strength.

steps.title: Virgo’s best friends are Taurus, Capricorn, and Scorpio.
steps.content: Virgo’s best friends are Taurus, Capricorn, and Scorpio. Meticulous and sensitive Virgo is an earth sign ruled by Mercury. Virgo has more flexibility as a mutable sign than the other earth signs but can still be quite analytical and pragmatic. When it comes to making friends, cautious Virgo goes slowly—but it’s because they’re focused on building a strong relationship one step at a time, from the ground up. [5] X Research source Taurus and Virgo value being helpful and reliable; they’ll immediately come running when the other needs a favor. They’re an easygoing duo and prefer simple activities (like taking a walk or catching up over coffee) to wild adventures. Capricorn and Virgo form a trine; they’re logical and disciplined but will also be one another’s greatest supporters. Both understand the value of setting goals and working hard to achieve them! Scorpio and Virgo are sextile, and though they’re very different, still make fantastic friends. Scorpio is known for their loyalty, while Virgo believes in being a supportive friend; this pair is sure to stand by one another.

steps.title: Libra’s best friends are Leo, Aquarius, and Aries.
steps.content: Libra’s best friends are Leo, Aquarius, and Aries. Libra is an air sign ruled by Venus, making them charming, fair-minded, and witty. As a cardinal sign (meaning they’re an “instigator” and natural leader), Libra is a superb host. Among friends, they’re mediators and peacekeepers. [6] X Research source Libra doesn’t like drama or conflict and gets along with signs that share their love of good conversation, including Leo, Aquarius, and Aries. Leo’s happy-go-lucky confidence is the exact kind of energy Libra likes being around, and Libra’s clever charm makes Leo eager to hang out with them. Aquarius and Libra are trine air signs; they’re both intellectual, curious, and very social, so it’s easy for them to enjoy long, thoughtful talks and discuss any topic. Aries and Libra are opposite signs. Where Libra is soft-spoken and cerebral, Aries is loud and passionate. However, they also balance each other out; Aries can help Libra be decisive, while Libra can help Aries be more open-minded.

steps.title: Scorpio’s best friends are Capricorn, Pisces, and Taurus.
steps.content: Scorpio’s best friends are Capricorn, Pisces, and Taurus. Intense, strong-willed Scorpio is a water sign ruled by Pluto, which oversees transformations, and Mars, the planet of action. This makes Scorpio driven and bold, yet sensitive. [7] X Research source As a fixed sign, they have an “all or nothing” mentality that makes them protective, loyal friends—and, though Scorpio can be very private, they have a magnetic presence that captivates others. Capricorn is sextile to Scorpio, making them supportive friends. Both signs are ambitious and focused on achieving their dreams—so they’re uniquely qualified to help one another do just that. Pisces is trine to Scorpio. Both signs will be eager to explore their most intense emotions and secrets; Scorpio can be sensitive to Pisces’ feelings and will always protect their gentle Pisces friend. Taurus and Scorpio are opposites on the zodiac wheel (but have much in common). Both signs are loyal, thoughtful, and contemplative, so they’ll have plenty of late-night chats about hopes, dreams, and the meaning of life.

steps.title: Sagittarius’ best friends are Aries, Aquarius, and Leo.
steps.content: Sagittarius’ best friends are Aries, Aquarius, and Leo. Ruled by Jupiter, the planet of expansion and growth, Sagittarius is an intensely independent and optimistic fire sign. Curious, mutable Sag is born to explore; they have a lifelong wanderlust that’ll take them anywhere in their search for knowledge. While Sag is perfectly happy to spend time alone, they get along with other fun, adventurous signs like Aries, Leo, and Aquarius. Aries and Sag both love adventure. Their greatest strength as friends is their fun-loving, fast-paced approach to life; together, they’ll always find something new and exciting to do. Aquarius is just as individualistic and cerebral as Sagittarius. Sag can appreciate Aquarius’ humanitarian ideas and rebelliousness, and Aquarius understands Sag’s wanderlust. This pair might travel the world together! Leo and Sagittarius are optimistic, confident fire signs—so, as friends, they’ll always pump one another up and share lots of laughs. Leo also doesn’t mind trying new things, which is a must for Sag.

steps.title: Capricorn’s best friends are Virgo, Scorpio, and Cancer.
steps.content: Capricorn’s best friends are Virgo, Scorpio, and Cancer. Capricorn is a pragmatic, ambitious earth sign ruled by Saturn, the planet of productivity and responsibility. As a cardinal sign, Capricorn is fiercely dedicated to chasing their goals in life (particularly career aspirations), which makes it tough for them to make room for friends at times. Still, Cap gets along with signs that will support their ambitions, like Virgo, Scorpio, and Cancer. Virgo can appreciate Capricorn’s tendency for pragmatism because it’s a characteristic they share. Their intuitive understanding of one another makes this pair such great friends. Scorpio and Capricorn could easily be best friends and business partners. Both signs are motivated and goal-oriented, and feel comfortable relying on one another; they may very well be the “power couple” of friendships! Cancer , another sextile sign to Cap, is the kind of friend that’ll come through for Capricorn no matter what. Cancer’s peaceful energy can also help Capricorn cool down and relax when they start stressing about their responsibilities.

steps.title: Aquarius’ best friends are Libra, Sagittarius, and Gemini.
steps.content: Aquarius’ best friends are Libra, Sagittarius, and Gemini. Innovative and intellectual Aquarius is the zodiac’s fixed air sign. Ruled by Uranus, the planet of change and progress, Aquarius is all about rebelling against tradition and forging a unique path through life. This sign can be eccentric, and they’re proud of it! While they’re very independent, Aquarius also wants friends that support their innovative ideas. [8] X Research source Libra and Aquarius work amazingly well together on projects. Libra, a cardinal sign, can get the ball rolling—while Aquarius, a fixed sign, can see things through to completion. Sagittarius relates to Aquarius’ curiosity, adventurousness, and innovative spirit. This pair will often get involved in activism or charity work together because they both want to make the world a better place. Gemini is intellectual and very social, just like Aquarius. That’s why Gemini is the perfect friend to be Aquarius’ sounding board when they need to talk through all of their revolutionary ideas.

steps.title: Pisces’ best friends are Cancer, Scorpio, and Capricorn.
steps.content: Pisces’ best friends are Cancer, Scorpio, and Capricorn. Pisces is a mutable water sign; deeply empathetic, compassionate, and open-minded—especially toward their friends. Ruled by Neptune, the planet of dreams, Pisces is also a very creative sign and tends to live with their head in the clouds! That’s why Pisces gets along best with dependable, affectionate friends who can be sensitive to their needs, like Cancer, Scorpio, and Capricorn. Cancer and Pisces are both very sensitive and intuitive, which means Cancer is the perfect friend to explore spiritual activities (like crystals or tarot) with Pisces. Pisces also admires Cancer’s nurturing spirit! Scorpio and Pisces both enjoy artistic, thought-provoking activities, so it’s easy for them to spend time together; museums, theater shows, and art classes are sure to be engaging for them. Capricorn is stalwart and dependable—exactly the kind of friend Pisces can rely on no matter what. Cap can bring some structure to Pisces’ dreamy life, while Pisces can help Cap unwind and enjoy themselves more.
